title: SEO & Link-Building Specialist
job_overview:
Sunrise Recovery is looking for a skilled and proactive SEO & Link-Building Specialist to enhance our digital presence and boost organic growth. If you're passionate about SEO and have experience in link-building, on-page SEO, and technical SEO, we'd love to hear from you! In this role, youâ€™ll be responsible for driving our SEO strategy using tools like SEMrush, Ahrefs, and Google Analytics to maximize performance. You'll focus on creating high-quality backlinks, optimizing content, and improving overall SEO rankings.

Key Responsibilities:
- Develop and implement effective link-building campaigns to improve our domain authority.
- Conduct thorough on-page and technical SEO audits, implementing recommended improvements.
- Utilize SEO tools to track and analyze performance, and provide actionable insights.
- Optimize content for target keywords, staying updated on SEO trends and algorithm changes.
- Regularly monitor SEO metrics and submit data-driven reports to recommend ongoing strategies.

Trial Period:
- 5-day trial with no payment, working 4 hours/day, starting at 7 PM Manila time (flexible).
- Focus on delivering high-quality backlinks and SEO improvements, with daily reporting.
- Successful trial completion may lead to a paid contract and a long-term position with our company.
